item.description:
Tickets are available at 1/2 price through a discount with our member Jill's employer. Woo hoo!
Ticket prices will be $30.00.

NSMT is a great venue--- Theatre in the Round, with good views from all seats!

We are going to a Sunday matinee performance this time, since beach weather is behind us.

Curtain time is 2pm. Let's plan to meet in the lobby by 1:30pm for a chance to chat and have a drink or snack for those that wish to. NOTE: If you arrive after the curtain goes up, you will NOT be allowed to sit with the group until after intermission. They are strict about this!!

NOTE to Patriots Fans (and we know who you are...!!) THE PATS are NOT playing that Sunday, November 16th, so no excuses there! They are playing Thurs. night November 13th against the JETS right at Gillette Stadium.

So PLEASE join us for a fun Sunday afternoon event that is sure to send us home with Happy Feet!!

* * * * We are planning dinner afterwards at Vinny T's Restaurant at the Liberty Tree Mall in Danvers. This will be posted as a separate meetup.

Carol at the NSMT box office has been handling our group sales.
Please contact the box office at 978-232-7200 to purchase your tickets. Reference my name (Jill) and the Merrimack Group.

** NOTE: this event is SOON so please make your decision and purchases promptly! Hope to see many of you there! Please email me or post any questions and I'll be happy to try and help!


Thank you! ~ ~ ~ Jill ~ ~ ~

42nd Street
Come and meet those dancing feet!

http://www.nsmt.org/i...

A tap-dancing musical extravaganza as only North Shore Music Theatre can produce. With a fun and infectious score featuring songs like "We're In the Money," "Lullaby of Broadway," "Shuffle Off to Buffalo," and "Forty-Second Street," 42nd STREET is destined to have you tapping your toes too! Set in 1933, 42nd STREET captures the spirit of anyone who has ever pursued a dream. This TonyÂ® Award winning musical tells the fairytale story of an aspiring chorus girl and her journey to find love and success on the Great White Way. 42nd STREET will transport you back to the glamour, spectacle and fashion of the 1930's. Escape with us to 42nd STREET!

Running time of performance is 2 hours, 20 minutes

Book by Michael Stewart and Mark Bramble
Music by Harry Warren
Lyrics by Al Dubin

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: North Shore Music Theatre event....42nd Street!!
